We're going to look at NYC Restaurant Inspections data.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")
  rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(boro, cuisine_description, inspection_date, violation_description, score, zipcode, grade) %>%
  filter(
    boro=="MANHATTAN",
    inspection_date > '2017-01-01'
  ) %>%
  drop_na(grade)
```

#Boxplot
```{r}
rest_inspec |>
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, score)) |>
  plot_ly(y= ~score, color= ~cuisine_description, type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```
